DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis : Quality Improvement tool like `` Heart Failure Discharge Checklist '' emphasize proper education patient , ensure appropriate dose titration counsel improve outcome congestive heart failure ( CHF ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Quality Improvement Tools Congestive Heart Failure ( CHF )
DOC.criteria: Patients admit SJMO principal diagnosis acute decompensated heart failure Age le 18 year Pregnant woman
